Pachirisu (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0416: Vespiquen
Pokémon
#0418: Buizel →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Pachirisu (TCG Pocket).

Pachirisu has been featured on 16 different cards since it debuted in the Diamond & Pearl expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Pachirisu cards are normally Lightning-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Pachirisu

Pachirisu
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
